item.title: Debugging the whole ecosystem
item.description: I was recently exporting a large number of records via CSV, some 130k rows. Luckily, the rows only consisted of three columns.

item.title: A Rate-limited Sidekiq Job - Part 2
item.description: In the last post, I talked about an initial approach to a rate limited sidekiq job. Sadly, it didn't scale for us; thousands of jobs were being tried and retried, while all of them exited early as the rate limit had been exceeded.

item.title: A Rate-limited Sidekiq Job - Part 1
item.description: Problem: A background task needs to hit an external service, but not too frequently

item.title: Building a guard rail
item.description: When you use a tool you built, you know where it?s sharp edges are.

item.title: Sharing with the world
item.description: Several years ago, I wrote a spreadsheet. It was awesome.
